name: Soundelta
description:
Try your hand at a new spin on traditional rhythm gameplay, with a rotating 3x3 lane layout. Learn the ropes and relax on accessible lower difficulties, or test your reflexes to the extreme with the highest difficulties.

Every map includes handmade music synced VFX, adding another level of expression and intensity to the gameplay.

Use the in-game editor to create custom maps, your style. Go all out with intense gameplay and visuals using built in VFX and decoration capabilities, a streamlined workflow, and live preview directly in the editor.


Initializing delta interface
